profile:
YOUR LOCAL BUILDING COMPANY


Here at PFC CONSTRUCTION we pride ourselves on being able to meet the needs of our clients. That is why we offer a wide variety of construction services. 

We take over both Residential and Commercial Projects 

Below are just a few of the services we offer our clients.

> Full Home Renovation
> Condominium Renovation 
> Home Additions 
> Design and Build
> Drywall Installation
> Floor Installation 
> Tiles Installation
> Framming 
> Painting Services 




Call us today at 647 482 0732 or 1 833 623 2384
